item.title: Impermanence
item.description: The ephemeral nature of things should not evoke despair but gratitude for the present moment and a serene sadness at the beauty and fragility of the world. “Cherry blossoms in the evening. Ah well, today also belongs to the past.” Issa

item.title: Emptiness is not Nothingness
item.description: “No, emptiness is not nothingness. Emptiness is a type of existence. You must use this existential emptiness to fill yourself.” Liu Cixin, The Three-Body Problem
